page.title: 10Population and housing,Evie
page.content: There are 79 homes in our D. Block, with a population of 210. 70% were born in Orkney, but less than 1/3 of these was born in Evie. Of the incoming population 60% comes from England. Only 6 adults have always lived in their present homes so there has obviously been a great deal of population movement. The reasons given by people coming into this area are as follows: 7% to be near relatives, 9% because their house was good value, 28% to be near their work, and 54% because they like living here. The quality of the environment and community is twice as important as financial considerations. 62% of houses are built mainly of stone; most of the others of concrete blocks. People generally have their own transport, 1/3 of vehicles being less than 3 years old.
